trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Carmel
There were no other sightings in Carmel on or around November 20th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was a passenger in a car, when my father and I noticed a very brightwhiteyellowish sphere like object with a green light and small trail behind it. It dropped strait down into a forested area. The object seemed to be a fewmiles away. My father and I agreed it looked like a meteor or shooting star,but it did not cross the sky- it shot strait down. We also agreed we have neverseen anything like that before. It was a semi-foggy evening and the light seemedto halo and surround the object. The green light extinquished, right after Iobsverved it. It certainly gave us something to talk about on the way home.
